.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RadioButtonList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser

summary.span: 代表用來封裝選項按鈕控制項群組的清單控制項。

span.span: Represents a list control that encapsulates a group of radio button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [指定清單版面配置Specifying List Layout](#specifying_list_layout) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項提供頁面開發人員可以透過資料繫結動態產生的單一選取選項按鈕群組。The control provides page developers with a single-selection radio button group that can be dynamically generated through data binding. 它包含清單上的個別項目所對應的成員具有集合。It contains an collection with members that correspond to individual items on the list. 若要判斷哪一個項目已選取，請測試屬性清單。To determine which item is selected, test the property of the list. ## 指定清單版面配置Specifying List Layout 您可以指定清單以設定轉譯的方式和屬性。You can specify how the list is rendered by setting the and properties. 如需版面配置選項的資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For information about layout options, see the enumeration. 依預設， 會設為 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。By default, is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`. 將此屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`使控制項水平呈現清單。Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` causes the control to render the list horizontally. 某些設定不允許水平版面配置。Some settings do not allow horizontal layout. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 列舉。For more information, see the enumeration. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入再顯示在 輸入的文字控制項。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式修改顯示控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically modify the display of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定表格儲存格的框線與內容之間的距離 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.

value.span: 表格儲存格的框線與內容之間的距離 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只在 屬性設為 `RepeatLayout.Table` 時，這個屬性才適用。This property applies only when the property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`. 您可以使用這個屬性來控制的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會新增至儲存格四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 它會使用資料表中最高的儲存格的高度和寬度的寬資料表中的儲存格。It uses the height of the tallest cell in the table and the width of the widest cell in the table. 產生的儲存格大小會一致地套用到資料表中的所有資料格。The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the table. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以填補的儲存格與 10 個像素的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the cells of a control with 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定相鄰表格儲存格之間的距離 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.

value.span: 相鄰表格儲存格之間的距離 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只在 屬性設為 `RepeatLayout.Table` 時，這個屬性才適用。This property applies only when the property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`. 您可以使用這個屬性來控制資料表中的個別儲存格之間的間距。Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the table. 這個屬性會套用垂直和水平。This property is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以空間的儲存格相隔 10 個像素的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to space the cells of a control apart by 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法會指示是否狀態控制項已變更。The method indicates whether the state of the control has changed. 換句話說，它會判斷是否已選取的清單中的項目控制項是與最後張貼的值相同。In other words, it determines whether the selected list item in the control is the same as the last posted value. 使用者變更選取的項目中的控制項變更值控制項。A user changing the selected item in the control changes the value for the control. 如果在控制項中，選取相同的清單項目，或如果控制項已停用，傳回`false`。If the same list item is selected in the control, or if the control is disabled, returns `false`. 當方法會傳回`true`控制項，ASP.NET 網頁架構會叫用控制項的方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the method for the control.

summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 應用程式 控制項的狀態已變更。

span.span: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. ASP.NET 網頁架構會呼叫方法控制何時方法可讓您指出已變更清單項目的狀態中控制項。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法呼叫方法以引發事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控制項開發人員可以覆寫方法來執行自訂處理，當使用者變更控制項中選取的項目。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user changes the selected item in the control. `RaisePostBackEvent`方法可以選擇性地執行驗證，再引發控制項事件。The `RaisePostBackEvent` method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要驗證一組控制項在頁面內的清單項目時選取控制項，請將並屬性，以`true`，然後指定要在驗證控制項群組屬性.To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the control is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to be validated in the property.

span.span: Displays the control on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法實作控制初始化物件清單，並呼叫方法，它會使用方法以呈現個別選項按鈕清單項目。The method implementation for a control initializes a object for the list, and calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual radio button list items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中的自訂伺服器控制項的方法，讓控制項一律會顯示具有描述性文字。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the control is always displayed with descriptive text. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRadioButtonListRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/CS/custom_radiobuttonlist_rendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRadioButtonListRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/VB/custom_radiobuttonlist_rendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRadioButtonListRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/CS/custom_radiobuttonlist_render.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRadioButtonListRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/VB/custom_radiobuttonlist_render.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法實作控制初始化物件清單，並呼叫方法，它會使用方法以呈現個別的選項按鈕清單項目。The method implementation for a control initializes a object for the list, and calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual radio-button list items. 方法控制項會忽略`itemType`和`repeatInfo`參數。The method for a control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters. `repeatIndex`參數值用來選取選項按鈕清單項目中的集合，並選取的清單項目呈現至輸出資料流。The `repeatIndex` parameter value is used to select the radio button list item in the collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示在 控制項中的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the control.

value.span: 要顯示在 中的資料行數目。

span.span: The number of columns to display in the .

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，您可以使用這個屬性指定的項目中的顯示的欄數控制項。When the property is set to , you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the control. 如果未設定這個屬性，控制項會顯示在單一資料行的清單中的所有項目。If this property is not set, the control displays all items in the list in a single column. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示的項目兩個資料行中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the items of a control in two columns. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of columns is set to a negative value.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection RepeatDirection { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection RepeatDirection
Public Overridable Property RepeatDirection As RepeatDirection

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::RepeatDirection RepeatDirection { System::Web::UI::WebControls::RepeatDirection get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::RepeatDirection value); };
member this.RepeatDirection : System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定群組中選項按鈕的顯示方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which the radio buttons within the group are displayed.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此屬性指定的顯示方向控制項。Use this property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 顯示資料行的數目一律由屬性。The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the property. 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`而如果屬性設定為，第一個資料行填滿由上至下，再下一個資料行，依此類推直到所有項目皆呈現。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果設為 3，項目的控制項顯示在三個資料行。For example, if is set to 3, the items of the control are displayed in three columns. 九項目清單會出現，如下所示。A nine-item list would appear as follows. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`而如果屬性設定為，清單中的項目會顯示在載入左到右的資料列，然後上至底部，直到所有項目皆呈現。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the property is set to , the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered. 例如，如果設為 3，項目的控制項顯示在資料列的三個項目。For example, if is set to 3, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items. 九項目清單會出現，如下所示。A nine-item list would appear as follows. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示的項目控制項資料行中的填入由上至下，和由左到右。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the items of a control in columns filled top to bottom, and then left to right. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 清單的顯示方向不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The display direction of the list is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用處理張貼資料的方法控制項。Typically, you should use the method to process posted data for a control. 方法是明確的介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

span.para: 若要定義處理張貼的資料的自訂實作控制項，並覆寫方法。明確介面實作會呼叫方法來處理控制項的張貼的資料。
To define a custom implementation for processing posted data for a control, override the method. The explicit interface implementation calls the method to process the posted data for the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定群組中選項按鈕的文字對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the text alignment for the radio buttons within the group.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定是否使用選項按鈕相關聯的文字會出現在左邊或右邊。Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the radio buttons appears on the left or right. 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Right`，文字會顯示選項按鈕的右邊。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the radio button. 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Left`，左邊的選項按鈕的顯示文字。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the radio button. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示在左邊的選項按鈕相關聯的文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the text associated with the radio buttons on the left side of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.TextAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.TextAlign Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 與選項按鈕關聯的標籤文字對齊方式不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The label text alignment associated with the radio buttons is not one of the values.
